TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField

summary.span: 表示将显示为数据绑定控件中的超链接的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a hyperlink in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由数据绑定控件 (如和) 以显示显示每个记录的超链接。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a hyperlink for each record displayed. 当用户单击超链接时，他或她定向到网页的超链接关联。When the user clicks a hyperlink, he or she is directed to the Web page associated with the hyperlink. 根据使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控制显示对象为一列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要显示的超链接的标题，请使用属性。To specify the caption to display for the hyperlinks, use the property. 使用属性来指定要时单击的超链接导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink is clicked. 如果你想要显示特定窗口或框架中的链接的内容，设置属性。If you want to display the linked content in a specific window or frame, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 当和在设置属性，所有超链接对象共享相同的标题和导航 URL。When the and properties are set, all hyperlinks in the object share the same caption and navigation URL. 同样，属性也适用于所有超链接。Likewise, the property also applies to all hyperlinks. 或者，你可以将绑定到数据源中的字段的对象。Alternatively, you can bind the object to fields in a data source. 这使你可以显示不同的标题中的每个超链接对象，并使每个超链接导航到不同位置。This allows you to display a different caption for each hyperlink in the object and to have each hyperlink navigate to a different location. 若要将字段绑定到标题，将设置属性。To bind a field to a caption, set the property. 若要创建的 URL 导航，设置属性的逗号分隔的字段，用于创建 URL 列表。To create a URL for navigation, set the property to a comma-separated list of fields to use to create the URL. 可以通过设置中指定的标题和导航 Url 的自定义格式和属性，分别。You can specify a custom format for the captions and navigation URLs by setting the and properties, respectively. 可以隐藏通过设置数据绑定控件中的对象属性`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 你可以自定义的标头和表尾部分对象。You can customize the header and footer sections of a object. 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示标题，将设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the or properties, respectively. 若要显示图像，而不是文本的标头部分中，设置属性。To display an image in the header section instead of text, set the property. 可以在中隐藏的标头部分对象通过设置属性`false`。The header section can be hidden in the object by setting the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持单个绑定字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual bound field. 若要显示或隐藏的数据绑定控件的整个标头部分，使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性 （如果可用）。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control, use the control's `ShowHeader` property (if available). 您还可以自定义的外观通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （如字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置对象。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||页脚部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||标头部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的数据项的样式设置对象。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象中显示一列中的静态超链接控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of static hyperlinks in a control. 中的每个超链接对象共享指定的相同标题和导航 URL和属性，分别。Each hyperlink in the object shares the same caption and navigation URL specified by the and properties, respectively. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定到数据源中的字段的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to bind a object to fields in a data source. 和属性用于指定要将绑定到标题和导航 URL 中，分别显示在每个超链接的字段对象。The and properties are used to specify the fields to bind to the caption and the navigation URL, respectively, of each hyperlink displayed in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: HyperLinkField();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常用时将字段添加到的动态创建的数据绑定控件。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 动态地添加对象转换为数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a object to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果你使用控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管动态可以将字段添加到数据绑定控件，但强烈建议该字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加对象传递给控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldCtor/CS/hyperlinkfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldCtor/VB/hyperlinkfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用方法复制当前的属性到另一个对象。The method is called by the method to copy the properties of the current object to another.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string[] DataNavigateUrlFields { get; set; }
.property instance string[] DataNavigateUrlFields
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlFields As String()

member this.DataNavigateUrlFields : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，用于为 对象中的超链接构造 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the names of the fields from the data source used to construct the URLs for the hyperlinks in the object.

value.span: 包含数据源中字段的名称的数组，用于为 中的超链接构造 URL。

span.span: An array containing the names of the fields from the data source used to construct the URLs for the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 默认值为空数组，表明未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty array, indicating that is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用当数据源包含多个字段必须结合使用来创建的超链接时，属性对象。Use the property when the data source contains multiple fields that must be combined to create the hyperlinks for the object. 中指定的字段属性将与中的格式字符串合并属性构造中的超链接对象。The fields specified in the property are combined with the format string in the property to construct the hyperlinks in the object. > [!NOTE] > 当你将设置.aspx 文件，以声明性代码的属性使用逗号分隔的字段名称列表。When you set the property with declarative code in an .aspx file, use a comma-separated list of field names. 除了使用此属性绑定到某个字段的超链接的 Url，你可以使用属性以将超链接的 URL 设置为静态值。Instead of using this property to bind the URLs of the hyperlinks to a field, you can use the property to set the hyperlinks' URL to a static value. 使用此选项，每个超链接将共享相同的 URL。With this option, each hyperlink shares the same URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and the properties are both set, the property takes precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataNavigateUrlFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataNavigateUrlFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataNavigateUrlFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataNavigateUrlFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataNavigateUrlFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定格式的字符串， 对象中的超链接的 URL 将以此格式呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the URLs for the hyperlinks in a object are rendered.

value.span: 用于指定格式的字符串， 中的超链接的 URL 将以此格式呈现。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the URLs for the hyperlinks in a are rendered.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表明没有对 URL 值应用特殊格式设置。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中的超链接的 url 中指定自定义格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom format for the URLs of the hyperlinks in a object. 如果未设置属性、 超链接的 Url 不会获得任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the hyperlinks' URLs do not get any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 应用格式字符串，则仅当属性设置。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任意文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字符串"项值： {0}"，则{0}占位符将被替换中的字段的值对象。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the {0} placeholder is replaced with the field's value in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含一个占位符，从数据源的字段的值不会包括在最终的显示文本。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符包含两个部分，以冒号分隔，在大括号，在窗体中进行包装 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是语法的格式设置的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，此值只能设置为 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后面的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|采用固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，在格式字符串"{0:F2}"显示一个带两位小数定点数。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定自定义格式将应用于中显示的超链接的导航 Url对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom format to apply to the navigation URLs of the hyperlinks displayed in a object. 指定的字段的值属性作为查询字符串传递给指定格式字符串中的网页。The value of the field specified by the property is passed as a query string to a Web page specified in the format string. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextField { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextField
Public Overridable Property DataTextField As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataTextField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中的字段的名称，此名称包含要为 对象中的超链接标题显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source containing the text to display for the hyperlink captions in the object.

value.span: 数据源中的字段的名称，此名称包含要为 中的超链接标题显示的值。

span.span: The name of the field from the data source containing the values to display for the hyperlink captions in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，以指定包含要显示的超链接标题的文本字段的名称对象。Use the property to specify the name of the field that contains the text to display for the hyperlink captions in the object. 除了使用此属性绑定到某个字段的超链接标题，可以使用属性以将超链接标题设置为静态值。Instead of using this property to bind the hyperlink captions to a field, you can use the property to set the hyperlink captions to a static value. 使用此选项，每个超链接将共享相同的标题。With this option, each hyperlink shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定字段从数据源绑定到中显示的超链接标题对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a field from the data source to bind to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataBind/CS/hyperlinkfielddatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataBind/VB/hyperlinkfielddatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要设置值的格式属性绑定到中显示的超链接标题对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the values bound to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. 设置值的格式为货币。The values are formatted as currency. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/CS/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkFieldDataTextFormatString/VB/hyperlinkfielddatatextformatstringvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定格式的字符串， 对象中的超链接标题将以此格式显示。

span.span: Get or sets the string that specifies the format in which the hyperlink captions in a object are displayed.

value.span: 用于指定格式的字符串， 中的超链接标题将以此格式显示。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the hyperlink captions in a are displayed.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表明没有对这些超链接标题应用特殊格式设置。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the hyperlink captions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定中显示的标题的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the captions displayed in the object. 如果未设置属性、 字段的值显示没有任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 应用格式字符串，则仅当属性设置。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任意文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式字符串"项值： {0}"，则{0}占位符将被替换字段的值，在显示时对象。For example, in the format string "Item Value: {0}", the {0} placeholder is replaced with the field's value when it is displayed in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含一个占位符，从数据源的字段的值不会包括在最终的显示文本。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符包含两个部分，以冒号分隔，在大括号，在窗体中进行包装 {`A`:`Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the field value's index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此参数是语法的格式设置的一部分。This parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，此值只能设置为 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后面的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|采用固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，在格式字符串"{0:F2}"显示一个带两位小数定点数。For example, the format string "{0:F2}" displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要设置值的格式属性绑定到中显示的超链接标题对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the values bound to the hyperlink captions displayed in a object. 设置值的格式为货币。The values are formatted as currency. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string NavigateUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string NavigateUrl
Public Overridable Property NavigateUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NavigateUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当单击 对象中的超链接时定位到的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 中的超链接时定位到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的 URL 中的超链接时要导航到单击对象。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked. 当设置此属性时，每个超链接将共享相同的导航 URL。When this property is set, each hyperlink shares the same navigation URL. 而不是使用此属性设置超链接的 URL，你可以使用属性绑定到数据源中的字段的超链接的 Url。Instead of using this property to set the URL for the hyperlinks, you can use the property to bind the URLs of the hyperlinks to a field in a data source. 这可以具有不同的 URL，每个超链接。This allows you to have a different URL for each hyperlink. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定静态网页中的超链接时，导航到单击对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a static Web page to navigate to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，单击 对象中的超链接时，将在此显示链接到的网页。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a object is clicked.

value.span: 单击 中的超链接时，在其中加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用单击该超链接时，属性指定的窗口或框架显示 Web 内容的链接到超链接。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a hyperlink when that hyperlink is clicked. 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），但下表中列出的特殊值除外以下划线开头其中每个范围的开头。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, each of which begins with an underscore. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 和更高版本支持`_search`目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later versions support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property is rendered as a `target` attribute. `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出对象必须是 XHTML 1.1 符合。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议你避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在其中显示与中的超链接关联的 Web 页的内容的目标窗口对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a target window in which to display the contents of the Web page associated with a hyperlink in a object. 单击超链接时，会将链接的网页显示在新窗口中。The linked Web page is displayed in a new window when the hyperlink is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 对象中的每个超链接显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for each hyperlink in the object.

value.span: 要为 中的每个超链接显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for each hyperlink in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示中的超链接的标题对象。Use the property to specify the caption to display for the hyperlinks in a object. 当设置此属性时，每个超链接将共享相同的标题。When this property is set, each hyperlink shares the same caption. 而不是使用此属性设置的超链接标题，可以使用属性以将超链接标题绑定到数据源中的字段。Instead of using this property to set the hyperlink captions, you can use the property to bind the hyperlink captions to a field in a data source. 这使你可以显示每个超链接不同的标题。This allows you to display a different caption for each hyperlink. > [!NOTE] > 如果和都设置属性，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示中的超链接的静态标题对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a static caption to display for the hyperlinks in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/CS/hyperlinkfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkField/VB/hyperlinkfieldvb.aspx#1)]
